channel.title: Golfing on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Golfing on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: An entrepreneur was playing golf, He had ambition and a lot of self-control. He wanted to hit the ball far But he ended up in the sandbar. …

A builder who’s quite a good golfer, Will take out his clubs with much fervor. His swing is so smooth, His ball goes aloof, And drives away …
A detective from the city, so clever Was golfing, and he really did sever His drive down the fairway Without a care, and he Was enjoying …

A cosmetologist named Mary Lou Was golfing, as people sometimes do She had quite a swing And could make the ball sing But she still had to …

There once was a plumber quite keen, Who found golfing was all that he’d seen. His swing was just great, His ball stayed on its plate, …
